mapper.select: SELECT equipment_manager.id, equipment_manager.`code`, equipment_manager.`name`, equipment_manager.company_id AS `company.id`, equipment_manager.`password`, equipment_manager.role_id AS `role.id`, equipment_manager.state, company_info.`name` AS `company.name`, role_table.`name` AS `role.name` FROM equipment_manager INNER JOIN company_info ON equipment_manager.company_id = company_info.id INNER JOIN role_table ON equipment_manager.role_id = role_table.id WHERE company_info.state = 1 AND equipment_manager.state = 1 AND equipment_manager.id = #{id}
